articles.title: Núñez, Uruguay players jump in stands after loss - ESPN
articles.description: Darwin Núñez and about a dozen Uruguay teammates went into the stands as fans brawled at Bank of America Stadium following a 1-0 loss to Colombia in a Copa America semifinal on Wednesday night before security personnel stepped in.
articles.content:
Jul 10, 2024, 10:48 PM ET
Darwin Núñez and about a dozen Uruguay teammates went into the stands as fans brawled at Bank of America Stadium following Uruguay's 1-0 loss to Colombia in a Copa América … [+1963 chars]

articles.author: Ryan Tolmich
articles.title: 10-man Colombia makes it 28-straight matches unbeaten as James Rodriguez notches sixth assist of tournament to lead Los Cafeteros past Uruguay into Copa America final - Goal.com
articles.description: Colombia is headed to their third-ever Copa America final thanks to a 1-0 win over Uruguay in Wednesday's semifinal match at Bank of America Stadium.
articles.content:
10-man Colombia is headed to their third-ever Copa America final thanks to a 1-0 win over Uruguay in tense semifinal

articles.title: Person in Colorado infected with bubonic plague. Here's what to know. - USA TODAY
articles.description: Wild rodents in the American West commonly carry bubonic plague. State officials say to avoid contact with animals and to take care of pets.
articles.content:
A person in Pueblo County, Colorado, about 100 miles south of Denver, has been infected with bubonic plague, local health officials said Monday.
